# Security Policy

**This file is used by GitHub to display security information. For detailed security information, see [SECURITY.md](../SECURITY.md) in the repository root.**

## Reporting a Vulnerability

**Please do not report security vulnerabilities through public GitHub issues.**

### How to Report

1. Go to the [Security tab](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/LlamaBrain/security/advisories) in this repository
2. Click "Report a vulnerability"
3. Fill out the security advisory form

### Alternative Methods

- **Discord**: Contact maintainers privately on the [LlamaBrain Discord](https://discord.gg/9ruBad4nrN)

### What Happens Next

- We will acknowledge receipt within 48 hours
- We will keep you informed of progress
- We will coordinate disclosure after a fix is available
- We will credit you in the security advisory (unless you prefer anonymity)

For more details, see the full [Security Policy](../SECURITY.md).
